REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2616 reute r f BC-ATCOR-<ATCO>-CUTS-DIV 03-26 0051

TEXT.TITLE: ATCOR <ATCO> CUTS DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Atcor Inc said it cut its quarterly dividend to three cts per share from 12 cts because of depressed earnings. The dividend is payable April 15 to holders of record April 6. It said it will continue to review the dividend on a quarterly basis. Reuter
